basics.name: Adam Graham
basics.label: Computer Science Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science: Data Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I am also pursuing a secondary major in Spanish & Latin American Studies at the College of Arts, Languages & Letters. I expect to graduate in Spring 2026.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI
University of Hawaii at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Prep materials and quality control during microfilming process
highlights: Create and re-check hundreds of accurate page-by-page collation sheets of newspapers for numerous newspaper titles for later data compilation, allowing ease of access to data pertaining to each newspaper issue
Compile numerous computer-generated targets each fiscal year to prepare for microfilming by our contract vendor, enhancing vendor coordination and project timeline adherence
Process and prepare dozens of boxes with newspapers and their associated collated data in a timely manner for shipment to our contract vendor

Analyze dozens of microfilm masters and use copies using a microscope and microfilm reader while cross-referencing collated data, allowing for thorough quality control checks to close existing microfilm contracts in a timely manner
Manage and train students by onboarding them to the microfilm process, provide feedback to their work, give instructions, and answer questions

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
